## utils.browserEvents namespace

## Functions

<table><thead><tr><th>

Function


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[bind(node, name, thisObject, func)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.bind_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Bind an event handler that should be called regardless of whether it is part of the active touch stream. Use this for events that are not part of a multi-part gesture (e.g. mouseover for tooltips).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[conditionalBind(node, name, thisObject, func, opt\_noCaptureIdentifier)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.conditionalbind_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Bind an event handler that can be ignored if it is not part of the active touch stream. Use this for events that either start or continue a multi-part gesture (e.g. mousedown or mousemove, which may be part of a drag or click).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[getScrollDeltaPixels(e)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.getscrolldeltapixels_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Returns the scroll delta of a mouse event in pixel units.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isRightButton(e)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.isrightbutton_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Returns true this event is a right-click.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[isTargetInput(e)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.istargetinput_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Returns true if this event is targeting a text input widget?


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[mouseToSvg(e, svg, matrix)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.mousetosvg_1_function.md)


</td><td>

Returns the converted coordinates of the given mouse event. The origin (0,0) is the top-left corner of the Blockly SVG.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[unbind(bindData)](./blockly.utils_namespace.browserevents_namespace.unbind_1_function.md)
